headline.0: Mary Did Not Have a Great "Day of the Girl Child"
headline.1: In the War Between the CIA and Senate Democrats, Everybody Won Except the Public

short_description.0: The International Day of the Girl Child is on a par with the worthy treaties some world leaders sign and then fail to implement. 190 governments have ratified the Convention on the Rights of Children.
short_description.1: This entire investigation into the CIA's role in illegal tortures has died, allegedly because the Senate's Sergeant-at-Arms doesn't trust the CIA, the CIA's Inspector General finds the CIA's accusations against the Democratic-led Committee to be based on "inaccurate information," and the U.S. Attorney General asserts that the CIA's case against that Committee isn't worth pursuing.

authors.0: Rebecca Tinsley, ContributorJournalist and human rights activist
